POLITICAL PARTIES, CANDIDATES & GRASSROOT MOVEMENTS
3 Demos
Theme Features

Demo 01Male Candidate

Great for a State Office candidate campaign! Visitors will easily get informed about the candidate and may choose how to participate.

Demo 01Female Candidate

Great for Local Office candidate campaign! Focuses on local policies and cleverly invites visitors to join campaign.

Demo 02Political Party

Great for Political Parties! Helps spreading political message and encourages engagement of both members and potential voters.

Demo 03Grassroots Movement

Make The Difference! Legislative efforts, fundraising and activism can be much more impactful and have a higher reach with a powerful presentation.
